testsuite.name: A new user account can be created if a proper unused username and password are given

testcase.name: creation is successful with valid username and password
testcase.classname: A new user account can be created if a proper unused username and password are given

testcase.name: creation fails with too short username and valid password
testcase.classname: A new user account can be created if a proper unused username and password are given

testcase.name: creation fails with correct username and too short password
testcase.classname: A new user account can be created if a proper unused username and password are given
